    • Highlights

    • Embark on an adventure-filled journey through Meghalaya's unique landscapes and natural wonders.
    • Explore mysterious caves, scenic mountain trails, and crystal-clear rivers.
    • Experience thrilling activities such as trekking, caving, and boating.
    • Immerse in the vibrant culture and stunning beauty of Shillong, Cherrapunji, and Dawki.

    Adventurous Meghalaya Tour - 6 Nights / 7 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Shillong

    • Arrive in Shillong, known for its rolling hills and vibrant markets.
    • Visit Ward's Lake and explore the local markets for an introduction to the city's culture.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Shillong.

    Day 2: Trekking in Laitlum Canyons

    • Embark on a trek to the breathtaking Laitlum Canyons, offering panoramic views of Meghalaya’s lush valleys.
    • Spend the day exploring the canyons, capturing scenic views and hiking along winding trails.
    • Return to Shillong for an overnight stay.

    Day 3: Caving Adventure in Mawsmai and Arwah Caves

    • Travel to Cherrapunji, known for its unique cave systems and waterfalls.
    • Explore the famous Mawsmai Cave and the expansive Arwah Cave, discovering limestone formations and ancient fossils.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Cherrapunji.

    Day 4: Trekking to Double Decker Living Root Bridge

    • Embark on a challenging trek to the Double Decker Living Root Bridge in Nongriat village.
    • Experience the marvel of natural engineering, where tree roots have grown into sturdy bridges.
    • Overnight stay at a guesthouse in Nongriat (basic accommodations).

    Day 5: Visit to Dawki and Boating on Umngot River

    • Travel to Dawki, known for its crystal-clear Umngot River.
    • Enjoy a boat ride on the river, where the water is so clear the boats appear to float on air.
    • Return to Shillong for an overnight stay.

    Day 6: Day at Leisure in Shillong

    • Spend the day exploring Shillong’s attractions at your own pace or relaxing.
    • Optional visit to Elephant Falls, Don Bosco Museum, or Police Bazaar.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Shillong.

    Day 7: Departure from Shillong

    • After breakfast, check out and transfer to the airport or railway station for departure.
    • End of the Adventurous Meghalaya Tour.
